cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: SSA-473245: Denial-of-Service Vulnerability in Profinet Devices

Revision.Description: Added solution for SINAMICS S120 V4.7, SINAMICS S150, SINAMICS G130 V4.7, SINAMICS G150 and SINAMICS SL150 V4.7
Added solution for SIMATIC S7-1200 and S7-1500 Software and Open Controller. SIPLUS devices now explicitly mentioned in the list of affected products
Added solution for SIMATIC S7-300 CPU family
Added solution for SIMATIC ET200MP IM155-5 PN HF
Added SIMATIC TDC CP51M1 and CPU555 to the list of affected products
Added solution for SIMATIC PN/PN Coupler. Added SIMATIC ET200ecoPN product variants (MLFB IDs) that are not affected
Added solution for EK-ERTEC 200P and S7-410 V8
Added solution for SIMATIC ET200SP IM155-6 PN HA and added ecoPN model (6ES7148-6JG00-0BB0) as not affected
Added solution for SIMATIC ET200SP IM155-6 PN HS
Clarified that no remediation is planned for ET200 devices

DocumentNotes.Note:
A vulnerability in affected devices could allow an attacker to perform a denial-of-service attack if a large amount of specially crafted UDP packets are sent to the device.
Siemens has released updates for several affected products, and recommends that customers update to the new version. Siemens is preparing further updates and recommends specific countermeasures until patches are available.

Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: DK Standard Ethernet Controller - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is available See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: EK-ERTEC 200 - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is available See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: EK-ERTEC 200P - Affected versions: All versions < V4.6 Patch 01 - Remediation: Update to V4.6 Patch 01 - Download: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109781345
SIMATIC CFU PA - Affected versions: All versions < V1.2.0 - Remediation: Update to V1.2.0 - Download: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109754628
SIMATIC ET200AL - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
SIMATIC ET200ecoPN, 4AO U/I 4xM12 (6ES7145-6HD00-0AB0) - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
SIMATIC ET200ecoPN, 8 DIO, DC24V/1,3A, 8xM12 (6ES7147-6BG00-0AB0) - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
SIMATIC ET200ecoPN, 8 DO, DC24V/2A, 8xM12 (6ES7142-6BR00-0AB0) - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
SIMATIC ET200ecoPN, 8AI RTD/TC 8xM12 (6ES7144-6KD50-0AB0) - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
SIMATIC ET200ecoPN, 8AI; 4 U/I; 4 RTD/TC 8xM12 (6ES7144-6KD00-0AB0) - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
SIMATIC ET200ecoPN, 8DI, DC24V, 4xM12 (6ES7141-6BF00-0AB0) - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"
SIMATIC ET200ecoPN, 8DI, DC24V, 8xM12 (6ES7141-6BG00-0AB0) - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is planned See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"

SINAMICS G120 V4.7 PN Control Unit (incl. SIPLUS variants) - Affected versions: All versions < V4.7 SP10 HF5 - Remediation: Update to V4.7 SP10 HF5 - Download: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109756820

SINAMICS S150 Control Unit - Affected versions: All versions < 4.8 - Remediation: Upgrade to V5.2 HF1 - Download: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109764679/

SINUMERIK 828D - Affected versions: All versions < V4.8 SP5 - Remediation: Update to V4.8 SP5 - Download: The update can be obtained from your Siemens representative or via Siemens customer service.
SINUMERIK 840D sl - Affected versions: All versions - Remediation: Currently no remediation is available See recommendations from section "Workarounds and Mitigations"

Siemens has identified the following specific workarounds and mitigations that customers can apply to reduce the risk:
* Restrict network access to affected devices.

As a general security measure, Siemens strongly recommends to protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms. In order to operate the devices in a protected IT environment, Siemens recommends to configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for Industrial Security (Download: https://www.siemens.com/cert/operational-guidelines-industrial-security), and to follow the recommendations in the product manuals.
Additional information on Industrial Security by Siemens can be found at: https://www.siemens.com/industrialsecurity

For further inquiries on security vulnerabilities in Siemens products and solutions, please contact the Siemens ProductCERT:
https://www.siemens.com/cert/advisories

- V1.0 (2019-10-08): Publication Date - V1.1 (2019-11-12): Added solution for SINAMICS S120 V4.7, SINAMICS S150, SINAMICS G130 V4.7, SINAMICS G150 and SINAMICS SL150 V4.7 - V1.2 (2020-01-14): Added solution for SIMATIC S7-1200 and S7-1500 Software and Open Controller. SIPLUS devices now explicitly mentioned in the list of affected products - V1.3 (2020-02-11): Added solution for SINAMICS DCP - V1.4 (2020-03-10): Added solution for SIMATIC S7-300 CPU family - V1.5 (2020-04-14): Added solution for SIMATIC ET200MP IM155-5 PN HF - V1.6 (2020-07-14): Added SIMATIC TDC CP51M1 and CPU555 to the list of affected products - V1.7 (2020-08-11): Added solution for SIMATIC PN/PN Coupler. Added SIMATIC ET200ecoPN product variants (MLFB IDs) that are not affected - V1.8 (2020-09-08): Added solution for EK-ERTEC 200P and S7-410 V8 - V1.9 (2021-01-12): Added solution for SIMATIC ET200SP IM155-6 PN HA and added ecoPN model (6ES7148-6JG00-0BB0) as not affected - V2.0 (2021-06-08): Added solution for SIMATIC ET200SP IM155-6 PN HS - V2.1 (2021-10-12): Clarified affected ET200ecoPN models - V2.2 (2022-02-08): Clarified that no remediation is planned for ET200 devices

Siemens Security Advisories are subject to the terms and conditions contained in Siemens' underlying license terms or other applicable agreements previously agreed to with Siemens (hereinafter "License Terms"). To the extent applicable to information, software or documentation made available in or through a Siemens Security Advisory, the Terms of Use of Siemens' Global Website (https://www.siemens.com/terms_of_use, hereinafter "Terms of Use"), in particular Sections 8-10 of the Terms of Use, shall apply additionally. In case of conflicts, the License Terms shall prevail over the Terms of Use.

Notes.Note:
Affected devices contain a vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker to trigger a denial-of-service condition. The vulnerability can be triggered if a large amount of specially crafted UDP packets are sent to device.
The security vulnerability could be exploited by an attacker with network access to the affected systems. Successful exploitation requires no system privileges and no user interaction. An attacker could use the vulnerability to compromise availability of the device.
At the time of advisory publication no public exploitation of this security vulnerability was known.
